<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Leopard's Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1089)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 76

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made of cobalt-colored steel rings that flow down the entire length of the garment, this _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [chain mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9)_ includes an armored face covering. The armor is said to be based on the same armor once worn by Azure Leopard, one of Old-Mage Jatembe's magic warriors.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You call upon the ferocity and grace of the leopard. The armor's rings flatten out to become a solid piece of flexible armor. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks and [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), but take a –2 penalty to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) checks. This lasts for 1 hour, but you can Activate the armor again to revert it back to its original form.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
